name: URLGuardrail
description: Extract and Validate URLs included in the request or response content by either performing a DNS lookup or a connection establishment.

policyAttributes.name: name
policyAttributes.description: The name of the guardrail policy. This will be used for tracking purposes.

policyAttributes.name: jsonPath
policyAttributes.description: The JSONPath expression used to extract content from the payload. If not specified, the entire payload will be used for validation.

policyAttributes.name: onlyDNS
policyAttributes.description: If enabled, a DNS lookup will be performed to validate the extracted URLs. If disabled, a connection attempt will be made instead.

policyAttributes.name: timeout
policyAttributes.description: The connection timeout for DNS lookups or connection attempts, in milliseconds. If not specified, a default timeout will be used.

policyAttributes.name: hideAssessment
policyAttributes.description: When enabled, the error response will omit detailed information about the reason for the guardrail intervention.
